name: New World Continued version 2.2
description:
OBJECTIVE - Kill the opposing team players
UFPS and Photon Networking
Max Players: 20
Time Limit: 60 Minutes
WINDOWS PC ONLY (thus far)
Uses UFPS and Photon Networking

THIS GAME HAS A MINIMAP in the TOP RIGHT CORNER

Download and install. Installs into  C:\Windows\Program Files (x86)\MyNewWorld
W S A D - Movement Keys

Mouse - To Look Around
Keys 1,2 - Change Weapons
Space Bar - Jump
M - MINIMAP (activates after pressing M several times) Then, it is a TOGGLE KEY
F - TOGGLE ON AND OFF FLASHLIGHT
F6 - MOUSE SENSITIVITY MODE (toggles ON and OFF)
======================
F6 MODE - Press F6,  TURNS ON MOUSE SENSITIVITY MODE - TOGGLE KEY   KEYPAD MINUS to decrease MOUSE SENSITIVITY by 0.1   
KEYPAD PLUS to increase MOUSE SENSITIVITY by 0.1
    Keypad Plus and Keypad Minus will not continuously change the amounts.
   You  have to keep hitting these keys over and over to decrease or increase the 
   amounts. No display on screen for these settings, as of yet, but that is coming
